system.name: I Am Error
system.effect:
Trigger: You gain a Status Affliction:  
Roll 1d10 and change which Status Affliction is gained: 
1-Sleep, 2-Burn, 3-Frozen, 4, Infatuation (Chosen Randomly among foes), 5-Poison
, 6-Confused, 7-Paralysis, 8-Enraged, 9-Disabled (chosen at random from Known Moves), 10-Suppressed. 
If the target already has that Status Affliction, roll again.
